name: Balloons
description:
Balloons is a single-player 2D racing roguelite game. Players can play as human-headed balloons with different expressions, gain lift through breathing, and experience a track full of fun and challenges. The game features random map generation with different routes and obstacles each time you play. The game also has multiple chapters with different themes, such as stadiums, night cities, and tropical rainforests, each with a unique style and difficulty. Can you get the highest score in all the chapters? Come join Balloons and enjoy the exciting and fun racing adventure!



Game Features

• Fast-paced: Each match can be decided in seconds. The loser will lose HP, but regardless of the outcome, players can choose an ability to upgrade.
• Simple operation: just control the arrow keys and breath key, press and hold to inhale, release to exhale and provide lift. But at the same time, it is necessary to grasp the timing of the movements in order to fly flexibly in the air.
• Various balloons: You can choose different balloon characters, each balloon has a basic skill and an advanced skill.
• Racing + Combat: You can use various skill combinations to attack or defend, such as throwing books, dashing, coughing, etc. You can even pop your opponent's balloons to win.
• Boss challenges: In boss battles, you not only have to race other balloons, but also avoid boss attacks. The boss's attack will directly deduct your HP, so be careful.
• Random maps: Each chapter has different themes and features, and the maps are randomly generated, so you have a sense of freshness every time.
• Multiple Difficulties: You can unlock the next difficulty after clearing the level, and each difficulty introduces a new mechanism.
